name: Junity 2020.31.1F4
description:
>Press PLAY to start

Hello world! The best graphic engine for video games appears to revolutionize the industry.

//This is a Unity bug (feature) fixer simulator

>Press ALT+F4 to start the tutorial

(It's a joke, don't press anything)

Develop your skills and your career with resources to learn at your own pace while you try to do a game in a 5 minutes game jam (Fast, Fast, FAST)

Click and type solve the problems in your components before the error collapses

If you have the game stable for the end of the Jam, congratulations, you have made a (Meta)game.

>EXPLORE with us.

Please do it, the game is full with of pun, each button does something, useful or useless, to procrastinate on your way to being a successful gamedev

A little disclaimer, we love unity and this is just a joke to make laugh people who like us spend a lot of time in front of the screen supporting the little bugs. Enjoy

> Press RESPECT to access the credits

Alberto Martín Dominguez - @Slantar- [Programming]

Sergio Font Gómez - @Bardolimo [2D Art / Game Design]

José Santos Garrido [Programming]

Ángel Siendones Sillero - @Elculoextremo [Programming]

Krill audio - @Krillaudio [Audio]

This game was made in 48 hours for the GGJ20 ^^
